subject: Baseball
Drunken and Reckless Driving
lead_paragraph: The Hall of Fame baseball catcher Carlton Fisk pleaded guilty in Joliet, Ill., to a misdemeanor drunken-driving charge, two months after the police found him asleep in his pickup truck in a cornfield.
snippet: The Hall of Fame baseball catcher Carlton Fisk pleaded guilty in Joliet, Ill., to a misdemeanor drunken-driving charge, two months after the police found him asleep in his pickup truck in a cornfield.
